name: 許益瑞
objective: 本門授課之目的在於介紹奈米材料及其製程(包括濕式及乾式奈米材料法)，並探討奈米材料的未來發展及應用。所包括的課程主題如下：1.奈米材料與奈米化學簡介。2.奈米材料與結構分析3.奈米材料製成4.奈米材料自我組成5.奈米材料模擬6.碳奈米微管7.中孔洞奈米晶體之合成8.半導體奈米粒之製備與應用9.奈米材料的遠景與未來發展
schedule:
Week 1.　　Introduction to Nanotechnology
Week 2.　　Introduction to Nanotechnology
Week 3.　　Review Modern Physics
Week 4.　　Review Atomic and Molecular Orbitals
Week 5.　　Physical Chemistry of Solid Surface
Week 6.　　Structure Characterization by X-ray diffraction
Week 7.　　Structure Characterization by X-ray diffraction
Week 8.　　Structure Characterization by X-ray Absorption Spectroscopy
Week 9.　　Chemical Characterization
Week 10.　　Physical Properties of Nanomaterials
Week 11.　　Electrical Conductivity
Week 12.　　Ferroelectrics and Dielectrics
Week 13.　　Superparamagnetism
Week 14.　　Special Nanomaterials
Week 15.　　Selected Topics Studies
Week 16.　　Selected Topics Studies
Week 17.　　Selected Topics Studies
Week 18.　　Selected Topics Studies
materials:
1.Guozhong Cao, Nanostructures and Nanomaterials-Synthesis, Properties and Applications, Imperial College Press, London, 2004.
2.C. N. R. Rao, A. Müller, and A. K. Cheetham, Nanomaterials Chemistry –Recent Developments and New Directions, Wiley-VCH, Weinheim, 2007.
3.T. Pradeep, NANO : The Essentials –Understanding Nanoscience and Nonotechnology, Tata McGraw-Hill Companies, New Delhi, 2007.
4.奈米科技— 基礎、應用、與實作, 高立圖書公司
5.馬振基, 奈米材料科技原理與應用, 全華科技
6.汪信、劉孝?, 奈米材料化學, 五南, 2006
